data.title: Meet The Team
data.meta_description: > Trusted Experts We understand how OT security can be compromised, and the consequences when it is. We defend organisations against those risks so they can be confident in the safety, integrity and reliability of their operations. The CyberPrism ethos is built on a trusted combination of human judgment and experience, alongside OT-compatible technology. At…
data.text:
At the core of this is a team that has worked at the highest level in Government Security Agencies, the Armed Forces, and the energy and maritime industries.

A team that combines best-in-class OT cyber security expertise with wide-ranging business experience and leadership skills, operating in the UK and internationally.

A maritime engineer with 35 years’ experience in energy, maritime and tech sectors from start-up to IPO. Chris co-founded IPCO International a Singapore based global Maritime and Energy Infrastructure development group. As CEO he grew the business from start-up to US$100m turnover and an IPO on the Singapore Stock Exchange.

Former Commandant General of the Royal Marines, commanded the UK’s Amphibious Force and led the UK’s maritime counter terrorism force. 33 years’ experience in maritime security and military information superiority. MD of CyberPrism since December 2019, specialising in software and client services for the protection of Operational Technology.

Former Technical Director for L-3 TRL, with over 20 years experience in IT and OT, including Critical National Infrastructure, offshore platforms and shipping. One of the very few to hold the CCP qualification CESG(GCHQ) Certified Professional at the highest Level, ‘CCP Lead Cyber Security and Information Assurance Auditor’.

Former Communications Officer for the Royal Marines, with over 20 years experience in radio networks, IT security, data protection and budget management. Dane was IT Manager for a group of 5,000 people and has delivered a broad range of IT infra projects across multiple security domains in the UK and overseas.

A former Royal Navy, Fleet Air Arm Artificer Engineer with almost 45 years of experience in the IT & Communication’s fields spanning a variety of roles from engineering to technical sales. Since leaving the armed forces Jim has worked across both the public and private sectors. He has amassed significant knowledge and contacts in many industries including defence, fire, security, critical life communications and manufacturing.
